170150.「でも あなたは\n 持ち物が いっぱいだッチ！\n<br>\n「持ち物を いっ:
But you are full of belongings! Leave or sell
your belongings for the time being and come
back again!
<end>

170151.「大変だッチ！ このふっかつのじゅもんに\n 入っていた ユーシャさまのお名前が:
Oh, no! I can't read the name of the Luminary
in this Spell of Restoration! I have no choice
but to name it "Eleven" for the time being!
<bw_break>

170152.「どの像が ほしいッチ？\n この中から ひとつだけしか渡せないから\n ホント:
Which statue do you want? I can only give you
one of these statues, so choose carefully
which one you really want!
<break>

170153.「あ！ 今 渡したもので\n オイラのお仕事が 全部完了したッチ！\n ありがと:
Ah! I've completed all my work with what I just gave you! Thank you! I was going to go home after work, but there's a nice breeze blowing here! So I'm going to hang out here a little longer! ...You should
come and have a chat with me when you're free, okay?

170154.「えっ オイラが見えるッチ？\n もしかして あなたは この世界の\n ユーシャ:
What, you can see I? Could it be that you are
the Luminary of this world?
<yesno><break>

170155.「他にご用は あるッチか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can do for you?
<break>

170156.「ふっかつのじゅもんについて\n 説明するッチ！\n<br>\n「ふっかつのじゅ:
The Spell of Restoration is a mysterious spell that brings back records and other things related to Luminary! The more adventures you
have in Luminary, the more the Spell of Restoration will change and grow! No matter how hard you search for it, you can't get it!
You can find the Spell of Restoration in another world, Erdrea! You should go and have a look! By the way, Spell of Restoration is
also used outside of Erdrea, but you can't cast it in Erdrea, so be careful!

170157.<select_se_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんについて\nお礼について\n:
<select_se_off>
About Spell of Restoration
About Thank You
About Ickle
<select_end>
<break>

170158.「オイラに 質問ッチ？\n 何が聞きたいんだッチ？\n<break>:
You have a question? What do you want to ask
me?
<break>

170159.「オイラから渡す お礼について\n 説明するッチ！\n<br>\n「時の化身であ:
When I, Tockle, casts Spell of Restoration, an amazing safe called Time Capsule opens! I came to Astoltia to spread the record of Luminary's
activities in Erdrea, which is in the Time Capsule! ...But the trouble is, I forgot that my image was originally only visible to a
limited number of people! I also forgot to remember the Spell of Restoration needed to open the Time Capsule! I was at a loss, and
then you appeared in front of me with a mysterious aura! I really need the Spell of Restoration made by Erdrea to finish my work!
Please help us!

170160.「これはまだ あなたに渡すことは\n できないッチ！\n<br>\n「新しい ふ:
I can't give this to you yet! If you tell me
about the new Spell of Restoration, I may be
able to give it to you!
<end>

170163.「これはもう\n あなたに 渡してあるッチ！\n<end>:
I've already given this to you!
<end>

170164.<pipipi_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんの チカラにより\n『<%sL_C:
<pipipi_off>
<%sL_COLLABO_ITEM>" was received by the power
of Spell of Restoration!<me_60>
<pipipi_on><end>

170165.<select_se_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんを伝える\nお礼をもらう\n:
<select_se_off>
Tell Spell of Restoration
Receive a thank you
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

170166.「この ふっかつのじゅもんには\n 『<%sL_JACK_NAME1>』っていう:
This Spell of Restoration has the Luminary's name "<%sL_JACK_NAME1>" engraved on it! Would you like to change the "Heart of
<%sL_JACK_NAME2>" that you can receive now to receive the name of "Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME1>"?

170167.「じゃあ やめとくッチね！\n<br>\n「別のお名前で ほしい場合は\n 今の:
Then, I'll stop! If you want it under a
different name, use a different Spell of
Restoration!
<end>

170168.<pipipi_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんの チカラにより\n『<%sL_J:
<pipipi_off>
The power of the Spell of Restoration enabled
him to receive the "Heart of
<%sL_JACK_NAME1>"!
<me_60><pipipi_on>
<end>

170169.「あれ？ このふっかつのじゅもんに\n 入っていたお名前は 『<%sL_JACK:
What's that? The name in this Spell of Restoration is "<%sL_JACK_NAME1>" which is the same name as "<%sL_JACK_NAME2>'s heart"! If
you want to use <%sL_JACK_NAME2>'s name as another Luminary's name, use another Spell of Restoration!

170170.「よく来たッチ！\n 何かご用は あるッチか？\n<break>:
Welcome! What can I do for you?
<break>

170171.「受け取りたいものを 選ぶッチ！\n<break>:
Choose what you want to receive!
<break>

173556.「……うーん？ でもユーシャさまとは違う\n 何か特別で とっても不思議なオーラ:
Hmmm...? But there is something special and very mysterious about you, something different from Luminary! I'm Ickle of Tockle, also known
as Tockle, and I'm a bit of a cuckooii! If you can tell me where you received the Spell of Restoration made in Erdrea, I will give you
something special related to the Luminary of Erdrea! I would like you to help me with this important work that the Elder has asked me to
do! Please help me with this important work that I have been asked by the Elder! So, let's get started right away!

173558.「オイラのことが 知りたいッチ？\n そんなことが 知りたいなんて\n あなた:
You want to know about I? Tockle, also known as Tockle, is a family that watches over the future of time! It is the mission of the
Tockle family to pass down to future generations the exploits and achievements of the Luminary in the various worlds! This time,
the Elder of Tockle asked me to spread the achievements of the Luminary of Erdrea in Astoltia! I will be in this town for a while,
so please come to me and the others to receive the Spell of Restoration!

176933.「またオイラと お話するッチ！\n 待ってるッチ！\n<end>:
I'll talk to I again! I'll be waiting for you!
<end>

179564.「この『<%sL_JACK_NAME1>の心』には\n ロトゼタシアの ユーシャ:
This "Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME1>" has the name of Erdrea's Luminary engraved on it! If you want to change it to another name, please let
me know the Spell of Restoration of another Luminary! You can change the name as many times as you like until you receive the "Heart
of <%sL_JACK_NAME1>" from me! Remember that!

181561.「ユーシャさま『<%sL_JACK_NAME2>』の\n お名前が刻まれている:
Luminary "<%sL_JACK_NAME2>" is engraved with
the name "<%sL_JACK_ITEM>" in the current
state.
<yesno_2><close>

182340.<pipipi_off><color_yellow>\n<%sL_JACK_IT:
If you receive <%sL_JACK_ITEM>, you will not be able to get any other character statues. Are you sure you want to
accept it?

182342.<pipipi_off>\nこのアイテムに刻まれた キャラクター名は\n別キャラ:
The character's name inscribed on this item can be changed by another character's Spell of Restoration. Do you want to receive this item
as "<%sL_JACK_ITEM>"? * Once you receive this item, you will not be able to change your name.

182343.<pipipi_off><color_yellow>\n『<%sL_JACK_N:
Would you change the Item name of "<%sL_JACK_NAME2>'s Heart" to "<%sL_JACK_NAME1>'s Heart"? You can change the
name here until you receive it.

183046.「………。\n<br>\n「……あなたに 伝えてもらった\n ふっかつのじゅもん:
The Spell of Restoration that you told me about echoed around the area in the form of yamabiko! I was so moved to hear the echoes of
the Yamabiko! Thank you for telling me about it! Please play with me again when you're free!

183047.「……え？\n ふっかつのじゅもんを\n まだ 教えてくれるッチ？\n<br>\:
Are you still going to tell me about the Spell of Restoration? I don't think anything will happen even if you tell me. But you're still
going to tell me?

183048.「ふっかつのじゅもんを 教えてくれて\n ありがとうッチ！\n<br>\n「……:
Thank you for telling me about the Spell of Restoration...but this Spell of Restoration could not open a new Time Capsule! ...but this
Spell of Restoration did not open a new Time Capsule! I'd like to have a Spell of Restoration that is more advanced and active
in Luminary's adventures in Erdrea!

183050.「あなたに 教えてもらった\n ふっかつのじゅもんの チカラで\n こんなものが:
This is what came out of the power of the
Spell of Restoration that you taught me!
<end>

183052.「ロトゼタシア製の ふっかつのじゅもんを\n 手に入れたッチ？\n オイラに 教:
Please let me know if you received the Spell
of Restoration made by Erdrea!
<end>

183132.「ふっかつのじゅもんを 教えてくれて\n ありがとうッチ！\n<br>\n「……:
Thanks for telling me about the Spell of Restoration! ...but I can already get everything out of the Time Capsule that I can
open! Perhaps you would like to change the name engraved in the heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> to another Luminary's name? If so, you need
another Spell of Restoration where the Luminary's adventures are more advanced! I'll do my best to get a Spell of Restoration made
in Erdrea!

183207.「やめるッチ？\n もしかして 『<%sL_JACK_NAME2>の心』を\n:
Quit? Do you want the "Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2>" in another Luminary's name? If so, please let me know the Spell of
Restoration of another Luminary who is as adventurous as you are! You can change the name as many times as you like until you
receive the "Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2>" from me! Remember that!

183262.「でも あなたは\n そうびぶくろが いっぱいだッチ！\n<br>\n「そうびを:
But your equipment bag is full! Come back
after you deposit or sell some items!
<end>
